players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie last night - he's the mafioso. Diana must be trying to protect him."
Diana: "I am the detective. Alice is lying. I investigated her and she is mafia. Vote Alice."

Charlie: "I'm Charlie, the villager. I haven't been investigated yet and I didn't kill anyone. Alice and Diana's claims are contradictory, so at least one of them must be lying. If Alice is the detective, then she would know who the mafioso..."
You: "Diana is clearly lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie - he's mafia. Diana is trying to protect him by framing me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
